title: Add support for dict batches in DataLoader
body_html:
1. There was a bug in DataLoader code. Lists, tuples, dicts, sets are instances of collections.Iterable. Only list and tuples are instances of collections.Sequence and only dicts are instances of collections.Mapping.
  2. Add support for dict like batches. Implementation is fairly straightforward.

Sasank.
body_text:
There was a bug in DataLoader code. Lists, tuples, dicts, sets are instances of collections.Iterable. Only list and tuples are instances of collections.Sequence and only dicts are instances of collections.Mapping.
Add support for dict like batches. Implementation is fairly straightforward.

Sasank.
body:
1. There was a bug in DataLoader code. Lists, tuples, dicts, sets are instances of `collections.Iterable`. Only list and tuples are instances of `collections.Sequence` and only dicts are instances of `collections.Mapping`. 
2. Add support for dict like batches. Implementation is fairly straightforward.


Sasank.
